column5: .... friggin hockey post... what is wrong with you people...  come on!!
GO WINGS GO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!     There ya go TJ!!!
Hasn't all the ice melted???  Shouldn't the players stay off of any thin ice that's left???  Bring on the Baseball!!!

Last time I was at a hocky rink I kept hearing this booming voice "You can't fish there" (heck, I'd only drilled three holes) I haven't bothered going back since. Silly game anyways, all that ice and they get mad if you drill a couple of holes.
yaa... stinking ice holes... go penguins......  whats red wing anyway.. i thought ya got them in Buffalo....
Mebbe Tiger Woods got it right in a weekend interview when asked about the playoffs. He uttered something sage like "Does anybody care about hockey any more?"  JF
Dont tell me yer afriad of Marty. You told me you wanted the Wings to win.LOL
You mean hockey didn't stop when the Leaves were out?
Thats the sport where if your home team wins you tear your city apart ..............hmmmmmmm  Maybe next time i catch my PB fish,  Ill light my neighbours truck on fire
